recipe.title: Spicy Coconut Curry Sauce
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups well-stirred unsweetened coconut milk (from 2 cans)
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, curry paste, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in oil in a wide 2-quart heavy saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until onion is softened, 6 to 8 minutes.
Add coconut milk and gently simmer, stirring frequently, until reduced to 2 cups, 20 to 30 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, cayenne, cilantro (if desired), and salt to taste.
